channel.title: (poll) do you like custom items/monsters in a server?
channel.description: just wondering what others like in their/servers they join as far as the stuff mentioned above, because i recently went through a thing were i made a lot of new gfx for a server, and now i hate custom stuff with new sprites. so yeah, just wondering...

item.title: (poll) do you like custom items/monsters in a server?
item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

OsRSC:

I am definitely for finishing off adding the rest of the dragon set, but i don’t think many want to do that.

I’ve done that long time ago, finished 3 more new armour sets and weapons + more features. But now lack of time to develop more, will have more time in @ 3 weeks

item.source: (poll) do you like custom items/monsters in a server?

item.title: (poll) do you like custom items/monsters in a server?
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:8, topic:552803”][quote author=slaveofmen link=topic=671717.msg4492180#msg4492180 date=1438822658]

Rs2 items made well into RSC sprites are awesome. I don’t really think random made up stuff is even remotely good… Lol

~K!zL

thats funny, because i made a 2007 chaos elemental in RSC form.

Well, I’m making sprites and textures for pk all day, but classickbds (ckx) hasn’t spoke to me in weeks.

I even made him a forum for his server.

If he doesn’t get back to me in another 3 weeks I’m going to modify the forum and give it or manage for someone else’s server. Sadly, I don’t have the sprites because my computer broke and ckx has the download links.

It’s all in his hands, he just doesn’t communicate very well.

Also, I’m not going to be makin. Sprites for anyone right now because of irl stuff.

Meh, in kinda over rsc anyways, I’m just gonna put noobscape v3 on a as card and leave, haha.

It seems like whenever I’m ready to quit I get new opportunities. Haha.

But I’m probably going to join slay pk again because I have the most affluence there right now (haha, more like burned bridges)

But I am still willing to hand over the forum I made, I’ll modify it to they specifications of your server.

[/quote]

Which server uses these sprites? :)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.source: (poll) do you like custom items/monsters in a server?

item.title: (poll) do you like custom items/monsters in a server?
item.dc:creator: @imabeast imabeast
item.description:
@imabeast wrote:

Custom items are good and bad, you won’t ever see a successful server that is actually profitable with only the replica version. The past popular servers I have played all had custom content to an extent.

Basically, from what I’ve seen in the past, people like higher level custom armors that look “cool” and rs2 remade items made into rsc.

Read full topic

item.source: (poll) do you like custom items/monsters in a server?

item.title: (poll) do you like custom items/monsters in a server?
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

I think custom items/npcs are great if implemented in a more professional manor i guess saying as in when people just throw a bunch of random content together and create a big pile of shit then no i dont like customs, that makes me hate them, but when someone makes a new map adds some theme and maybe a story line and some new objects and rewards and just a few custom npcs just to show they went that extra step and created something unique and different then yes i love customs.

Read full topic

item.title: (poll) do you like custom items/monsters in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I think its safe to say that I and Brutal Pkers have the most custom content. With that being said, yes I love it. That hard part is proper implementation both graphically and code wise. That’s why you probably hate it, you had to make it.

Read full topic
